trans-unit.source: The MASK bit simply tells whether the message is encoded. Messages from the client must be masked, so your server should expect this to be 1. (In fact, section 5.1 of the spec says that your server must disconnect from a client if that client sends an unmasked message.) When sending a frame back to the client, do not mask it and do not set the mask bit. We'll explain masking later. Note: You have to mask messages even when using a secure socket. RSV1-3 can be ignored, they are for extensions.
trans-unit.target: MASK位仅告诉消息是否已编码。来自客户端的消息必须被屏蔽，因此您的服务器应该期望该值为1。（实际上，规范的5.1节说，如果该客户端发送未屏蔽的消息，则服务器必须与客户端断开连接。）发送回帧时对于客户端，请勿屏蔽它，也不要设置屏蔽位。稍后我们将解释遮罩。注意：即使使用安全套接字，也必须屏蔽消息。RSV1-3可以忽略，它们用于扩展。

trans-unit.source: The MASK bit simply tells whether the message is encoded. Messages from the client must be masked, so your server should expect this to be 1. (In fact, section 5.1 of the spec says that your server must disconnect from a client if that client sends an unmasked message.) When sending a frame back to the client, do not mask it and do not set the mask bit. We'll explain masking later. Note: You have to mask messages even when using a secure socket. RSV1-3 can be ignored, they are for extensions.

trans-unit.source: The March 20, 2018 version of the specification; the last one to include this property
trans-unit.target: 2018年3月20日的规范版本;是最后一个包含此属性的版本。

trans-unit.source: The Media Capabilities API provide more powerful features than say MediaRecorder.isTypeSupported() or HTMLMediaElement.canPlayType(), which only address general browser support, not performance. The API also provides abilities to access display property information such as supported color gamut, dynamic range abilities, and real-time feedback about the playback.
trans-unit.target: 与 MediaRecorder.isTypeSupported() 或 HTMLMediaElement.canPlayType() 相比，Media Capabilities API提供了更强大的功能，后者仅解决常规的浏览器支持，而不涉及性能。该API还提供了访问显示属性信息的功能，例如支持的色域，动态范围功能以及有关回放的实时反馈。

trans-unit.source: The Media Session API provides a way to customize media notifications. It does this by providing metadata for display by the user agent of the media your web app is playing, and allows you to create event handlers, to define your own behaviors for a user-agent playback controls. The aim of this is allowing users to know what's playing, and to control it, without opening the specific page that launched it.
trans-unit.target: 媒体会话 API 提供了一种自定义媒体通知的方法。它通过提供元数据供用户代理显示你的web应用正在播放的媒体,并允许你创建事件处理程序,为用户代理的播放控制定义你自己的行为。这样做的目的是让用户知道正在播放什么,并控制它,而无需打开启动它的特定页面。

trans-unit.source: The Media Source Extensions API (MSE) provides functionality enabling plugin-free web-based streaming media. Using MSE, media streams can be created via JavaScript, and played using <audio> and <video> elements.
trans-unit.target: 媒体源扩展API（MSE）提供的功能可实现无插件的基于Web的流媒体。使用MSE，可以通过JavaScript创建媒体流，并使用 <audio> 和 <video> 元素进行播放。

trans-unit.source: The MediaCapabilities interface
trans-unit.target: MediaCapabilities接口

trans-unit.source: The MediaStream Image Capture API is an API for capturing images or videos from a photographic device. In addition to capturing data, it also allows you to retrieve information about device capabilities such as image size, red-eye reduction and whether or not there is a flash and what they are currently set to. Conversely, the API allows the capabilities to be configured within the constraints what the device allows.
trans-unit.target: MediaStream Image Capture API 是一个用于从摄影设备中捕捉图像或视频的 API。除了捕捉数据,它还允许你检索设备功能的信息,如图像大小,红眼减少和是否有闪光灯,以及它们当前的设置。相反,API允许在设备允许的约束条件下配置功能。

trans-unit.source: The MediaStream Recording API is comprised of a single major interface, MediaRecorder, which does all the work of taking the data from a MediaStream and delivering it to you for processing. The data is delivered by a series of dataavailable events, already in the format you specify when creating the MediaRecorder. You can then process the data further or write it to file as desired.
trans-unit.target: MediaStream Recording API由一个主要接口 MediaRecorder 组成，该接口负责从 MediaStream 中获取数据并将其传递给您进行处理的所有工作。数据是通过一系列数据 dataavailable 事件传递的，这些事件已经采用创建 MediaRecorder 时指定的格式。然后，您可以根据需要进一步处理数据或将其写入文件。

trans-unit.source: The MediaStream passed into the MediaRecorder() constructor when the MediaRecorder was originally created.
trans-unit.target: 最初创建 MediaRecorder 时，MediaStream传递到 MediaRecorder() 构造函数中。

trans-unit.source: The Mono buffer will have 44100 samples, and 44100 frames. The length property will be 44100.
trans-unit.target: 单声道缓冲区将具有44100个样本和44100个帧。该 length 属性将是44100。

trans-unit.source: The Navigation Timing API can be used to gather performance data on the client side to be sent to a server via XHR as well as measure data that was very difficult to measure by other means such as time to unload a previous page, domain look up time, window.onload total time, etc.
trans-unit.target: 导航计时API可以用来收集客户端的性能数据,通过XHR发送给服务器,同时也可以测量其他方式很难测量的数据,比如卸载上一个页面的时间、域名查找时间、window.onload总时间等。

trans-unit.source: The Navigation Timing API lets you easily obtain detailed and highly accurate timing information to help isolate performance problems with your site's code or resources. Unlike other tools or libraries, the Navigation Timing API lets you gather information that only the browser can provide at a level of accuracy much improved over other techniques. It also offers the advantage of being able to provide timing information as perceived by the user rather than data that has no correlation to what the user experiences.
trans-unit.target: Navigation Timing API使您可以轻松获取详细且高度准确的时序信息，以帮助隔离站点代码或资源的性能问题。与其他工具或库不同，Navigation Timing API使您可以收集信息，只有浏览器才能提供这些信息，其准确性要比其他技术大大提高。它还具有能够提供用户所感知的定时信息而不是与用户体验无关的数据的优点。

trans-unit.source: The Network API is enabled by default. Can be disabled using the dom.netinfo.enabled preference.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，网络API已启用。可以使用 dom.netinfo.enabled 首选项禁用。

trans-unit.source: The Network Information API provides information about the system's connection in terms of general connection type (e.g., 'wifi', 'cellular', etc.). This can be used to select high definition content or low definition content based on the user's connection. The entire API consists of the addition of the NetworkInformation interface and a single property to the Navigator interface: Navigator.connection.
trans-unit.target: 网络信息API按照常规连接类型（例如，“ wifi”，“蜂窝”等）提供有关系统连接的信息。这可用于根据用户的连接选择高清晰度内容或低清晰度内容。整个API包括 NetworkInformation 接口的添加和 Navigator 接口的单个属性： Navigator.connection 。

trans-unit.source: The NodeList object that forEach() is being applied to.
trans-unit.target: 适用于 forEach() 的NodeList对象。

trans-unit.source: The NodeSelector interface
trans-unit.target: NodeSelector接口

trans-unit.source: The Notifications API allows web pages to control the display of system notifications to the end user. These are outside the top-level browsing context viewport, so therefore can be displayed even when the user has switched tabs or moved to a different app. The API is designed to be compatible with existing notification systems, across different platforms.
trans-unit.target: 通知API允许网页控制向终端用户显示系统通知。这些通知在顶层浏览上下文视口之外,因此即使用户已经切换标签或移动到不同的应用程序,也可以显示。该API被设计为与现有的通知系统兼容,跨越不同的平台。

trans-unit.source: The Object, returned by the navigator.mozSocial property, is available within the social media provider's panel to provide functionality it may need.
trans-unit.target: 由 navigator.mozSocial 属性返回的Object 在社交媒体提供商的面板中可用，以提供可能需要的功能。

trans-unit.source: The Oculus Rift headset has a latency of 20 ms or less, but with mobile device-based setups it will depend heavily on the smartphone CPU power and other capabilities.
trans-unit.target: Oculus Rift头显的延迟为20毫秒或更少,但对于基于移动设备的设置,它将严重依赖于智能手机的CPU功率和其他能力。

trans-unit.source: The Payment Request API provides a consistent user experience for both merchants and users. It is not a new way for paying for things; rather, it's a way for user's to select their preferred way of paying for things, and make that information available to a merchant.
trans-unit.target: 支付请求API为商家和用户提供了一致的用户体验。它并不是一种新的支付方式,而是让用户选择自己喜欢的支付方式,并将这些信息提供给商家。

trans-unit.target: Performance Timeline API 通过三种方法扩展了 Performance 接口，这三种方法提供了不同的机制来获取一组 performance records (metrics) ，具体取决于指定的过滤条件。方法是：

trans-unit.source: The Pointer lock API also extends the Document interface, adding both a new property and a new method. The new property is used for accessing the currently locked element (if any), and is named pointerLockElement and the new method on Document is exitPointerLock() and, as the name implies, it is used to exit the pointer lock.
trans-unit.target: 指针锁定API还扩展了 Document 接口，添加了新属性和新方法。新属性用于访问当前锁定的元素（如果有的话），命名为 pointerLockElement ， Document 上的新方法是 exitPointerLock() ，顾名思义，它用于退出指针锁定。

trans-unit.source: The Pointer lock API extends the normal MouseEvent interface with movement attributes. Two new attributes to mouse events—movementX and movementY—provide the change in mouse positions. The values of the parameters are the same as the difference between the values of MouseEvent properties, screenX and screenY, which are stored in two subsequent mousemove events, eNow and ePrevious. In other words, the Pointer lock parameter movementX = eNow.screenX - ePrevious.screenX.
trans-unit.target: 指针锁定API 使用运动属性扩展了普通的 MouseEvent 接口。两个新的属性鼠标事件- movementX 和 movementY -提供在鼠标位置的变化。参数的值与 MouseEvent 属性 screenX 和 screenY 的值之间的差异相同，它们存储在两个后续的 mousemove 事件 eNow 和 ePrevious 中。换句话说，指针锁定参数 movementX = eNow.screenX - ePrevious.screenX 。

trans-unit.source: The Pointer lock API, similar to the Fullscreen API, extends DOM elements by adding a new method, requestPointerLock(). As it has recently unprefixed, you would currently declare it something like this, for example if you wanted to request pointer lock on a canvas element:

trans-unit.source: The Presentation API lets a user agent (such as a Web browser) effectively display web content through large presentation devices such as projectors and network-connected televisions. Supported types of multimedia devices include both displays which are wired using HDMI, DVI, or the like, or wireless, using DLNA, Chromecast, AirPlay, or Miracast.
trans-unit.target: Presentation API使用户代理（例如Web浏览器）可以通过大型演示设备（例如投影仪和联网电视）有效地显示Web内容。支持的多媒体设备类型包括两种显示器，它们使用HDMI，DVI等进行有线连接，或者使用DLNA，Chromecast，AirPlay或Miracast无线连接。

trans-unit.source: The Promise returned from fetch()won’t reject on HTTP error status even if the response is an HTTP 404 or 500. Instead, it will resolve normally (with ok status set to false), and it will only reject on network failure or if anything prevented the request from completing.
trans-unit.target: 即使响应是HTTP 404或500，从 fetch() 返回的Promise 也不会拒绝HTTP错误状态。相反，它将正常解析（ ok 状态设置为false），并且仅在网络故障或失败时拒绝。如果有任何事情阻止了请求的完成。

trans-unit.source: The PublicKeyCredentialRequestOptions specifies publicKey options that can be used with the WebAuthnget() call.
trans-unit.target: PublicKeyCredentialRequestOptions指定可与WebAuthn get（）调用一起使用的publicKey选项。

trans-unit.source: The RTCP mux policy to use when gathering ICE candidates, in order to support non-multiplexed RTCP. The value must be one of those from the RTCRtcpMuxPolicy enum. The default is "require".
trans-unit.target: 收集ICE候选项时要使用的RTCP多路复用策略，以支持非复用的RTCP。该值必须是 RTCRtcpMuxPolicy 枚举值之一。默认值为 "require" 。

trans-unit.source: The RTCSessionDescriptionCallback is passed into the RTCPeerConnection object when requesting it to create offers or answers.
trans-unit.target: 当请求 RTCPeerConnection 创建要约或答案时，将其传递到RTCPeerConnection对象。

trans-unit.target: RTCStats子字典

trans-unit.source: The Resource Timing API includes two methods that extend the Performance interface. The clearResourceTimings() method removes all "resource" type performance entries from the browser's resource performance entry buffer. The setResourceTimingBufferSize() method sets the resource performance entry buffer size to the specified number of resource performance entries.
trans-unit.target: 资源计时API包括两种扩展 Performance 接口的方法。该 clearResourceTimings() 方法去除所有“ resource 从浏览器的”类型的性能项资源的性能条目缓冲区中。所述 setResourceTimingBufferSize() 方法设置资源性能条目缓冲器大小的资源的指定数目的 performance entries 。

trans-unit.source: The Response status is not in the 200 range (i.e., not a successful response.) This occurs if the request does not return successfully, but also if the request is a cross-origin no-cors request (in which case the reported status is always 0.)
trans-unit.target: 响应状态不在200范围内（即，不是成功的响应。）如果请求未成功返回，但是如果请求是跨域无芯请求（在这种情况下，报告的状态为：始终为0。）

trans-unit.source: The SCTP transport is used for transmitting and receiving data for any and all RTCDataChannels on the peer connection.
trans-unit.target: SCTP传输用于在对等连接上发送和接收任何 RTCDataChannel 的数据。

trans-unit.source: The SDP (Session Description Protocol) string describing the local end of the connection from the perspective of the sender (or the remote end of the conection from the receiver's point of view).
trans-unit.target: SDP(会话描述协议)字符串,从发送方的角度描述连接的本地端(或从接收方的角度描述连接的远程端)。

trans-unit.source: The SDP answer is generated and sent using a method called sendAnswer(), which generates the answer using createAnswer() then sends the resulting SDP to the other peer over the signaling service.
trans-unit.target: 使用称为 sendAnswer() 的方法生成并发送SDP答案，该方法使用 createAnswer() 生成答案，然后通过信令服务将生成的SDP发送给另一个对等方。

trans-unit.source: The SDP candidate string, describing the proposed connection method. You typically don't need to look at the contents of this string. All your code needs to do is route it through to the remote peer using the signaling server.
trans-unit.target: SDP候选字符串,描述了建议的连接方法。你通常不需要看这个字符串的内容。你的代码需要做的就是使用信令服务器将其路由到远程对等体。

trans-unit.source: The SDP contained in the sdp property is the definitive choice in the exchange. In other words, this session description describes the agreed-upon configuration, and is being sent to finalize negotiation.
trans-unit.target: sdp 属性中包含的SDP 是交换中的最终选择。换句话说，此会话描述描述了约定的配置，并且正在发送以完成协商。

trans-unit.source: The SDP contained in the sdp property is the definitive choice in the exchange. In other words, this session description describes the agreed-upon configuration, and is being sent to finalize negotiation.
trans-unit.target: sdp 属性中包含的SDP 是交换中的最终选择。换句话说，此会话描述描述了约定的配置，并且正在发送以完成协商。

trans-unit.source: The SDP representing the candidate the ICE layer wants to transmit to the other peer.
trans-unit.target: 代表ICE层要传送给对方对等体的候选者的SDP。

trans-unit.source: The SDP string describing the offer.
trans-unit.target: 描述报价的SDP字符串。

trans-unit.source: The SVG data-* class of global attributes.
trans-unit.target: SVG data-* 类的全局属性。

trans-unit.source: The Screen Orientation API is made to prevent or handle such a change.
trans-unit.target: 屏幕方向API就是为了防止或处理这种变化而制作的。

trans-unit.source: The Selection API has a common behaviour (i.e. shared between browsers) that govern how focus behaviour changes for editing hosts, after some of its methods are called.
trans-unit.target: Selection API具有一种共同的行为（即，在浏览器之间共享），该行为控制着调用某些方法后焦点行为如何更改以编辑主机。

trans-unit.source: The Selection API provides functionality for reading and manipulating the range of text selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: Selection API提供了读取和操作用户选择的文本范围的功能。

trans-unit.source: The Selection API specification is based on the HTML Editing APIs specification and focuses on the Selection-related functionality.
trans-unit.target: Selection API规范是以HTML编辑API规范为基础的,主要是与Selection相关的功能。

trans-unit.source: The Selectors API provides methods that make it quick and easy to retrieve Element nodes from the DOM by matching against a set of selectors. This is much faster than past techniques, wherein it was necessary to, for example, use a loop in JavaScript code to locate the specific items you needed to find.
trans-unit.target: Selectors API提供了一些方法，通过与一组选择器进行匹配，可以快速轻松地从DOM中检索 Element 节点。这比过去的技术要快得多，在过去的技术中，例如有必要使用JavaScript代码中的循环来定位需要查找的特定项目。

trans-unit.source: The Service Worker Cookbook
trans-unit.target: 服务工作者食谱

trans-unit.source: The Service worker will now control pages, but only those opened after the register() is successful. i.e. a document starts life with or without a Service worker and maintains that for its lifetime. So documents will have to be reloaded to actually be controlled.
trans-unit.target: 现在，服务工作者将控制页面，但仅控制那些在 register() 成功之后打开的页面。即，文档在有或没有Service Worker的情况下开始生效，并在其生命周期内一直保持下去。因此，必须重新加载文档才能进行实际控制。

trans-unit.source: The Simple stream pump example we’ve been studying throughout this article includes a second part — once we’ve read the image from the fetch body in chunks, we then enqueue them into another, custom stream of our own creation. How do we create this? The ReadableStream constructor.
trans-unit.target: 我们在本文中一直在研究的简单流泵示例包括第二部分-一旦我们从读取主体中分块读取了图像，然后将它们放入我们自己创建的另一个自定义流中。我们如何创建它？该 ReadableStream 构造。

trans-unit.source: The Stereo buffer will have 88200 samples, but still 44100 frames. The length property will still be 44100 since it's equal to the number of frames.
trans-unit.target: 立体声缓冲区将具有88200个样本，但仍为44100个帧。该 length 属性将仍然是44100，因为它等于帧数。

trans-unit.source: The Storage Access API is designed to allow embedded content to request access to storage that would otherwise be blocked when a user’s browser is set to block all third-party cookies. Since embedded content won’t know which storage policy is in use by the user, it’s best to always check whether the embedded frame has storage access before attempting to read or write from storage. This is particularly true for Document.cookie access, as browsers will often return an empty cookie jar when third-party cookies are blocked.
trans-unit.target: 存储访问API旨在允许嵌入的内容请求访问存储，否则当用户的浏览器设置为阻止所有第三方cookie时，存储将被阻止。由于嵌入式内容不知道用户正在使用哪种存储策略，因此最好在尝试从存储中读取或写入之前，始终检查嵌入式框架是否具有存储访问权限。对于 Document.cookie 访问尤其如此，因为当第三方cookie被阻止时，浏览器通常会返回一个空的cookie jar。

trans-unit.source: The Storage Access API is intended to solve this problem; embedded cross-origin content can request unrestricted access to its first-party storage on a site-by-site basis via the Document.requestStorageAccess() method, and check whether it already has access via the Document.hasStorageAccess() method.
trans-unit.target: Storage Access API旨在解决此问题。嵌入式跨域内容可以通过 Document.requestStorageAccess() 方法逐站点请求对其第一方存储的无限制访问，并检查是否已经通过 Document.hasStorageAccess() 方法进行访问。

trans-unit.source: The Storage Access API provides a way for embedded, cross-origin content to gain unrestricted access to storage that it would normally only have access to in a first-party context (we refer to this as an origin’s first-party storage). The API provides methods that allow embedded resources to check whether they currently have access to their first-party storage, and to request access to their first-party storage from the user agent.
trans-unit.target: Storage Access API为嵌入式跨域内容提供了一种对存储的不受限制的访问方式，该存储通常只能在第一方上下文中访问（我们将其称为来源的第一方存储）。该API提供的方法允许嵌入式资源检查其当前是否有权访问其第一方存储，并从用户代理请求访问其第一方存储。

trans-unit.source: The Storage Standard defines a common, shared storage system to be used by all APIs and technologies that store content-accessible data for individual Web sites. The Storage API gives sites' code the ability to find out how much space they can use, how much they are already using, and even control whether or not they need to be alerted before the user agent disposes of site data in order to make room for other things.
trans-unit.target: 存储标准定义了一个通用的共享存储系统，供所有用于存储单个网站的可访问内容的数据的API和技术使用。 Storage API使站点的代码能够发现它们可以使用多少空间，已经使用了多少空间，甚至可以控制是否需要在用户代理处置站点数据之前提醒它们以腾出空间。对于其他事情。

trans-unit.source: The Streams API allows JavaScript to programmatically access streams of data received over the network and process them as desired by the developer.
trans-unit.target: Streams API允许JavaScript以编程方式访问通过网络接收的数据流,并按照开发者的要求进行处理。

trans-unit.source: The Streams API is experimental, and support is at an early stage right now. Only Chrome currently has basic writable streams implemented.
trans-unit.target: 流API是实验性的,现在的支持还处于早期阶段。目前只有Chrome浏览器实现了基本的可写流。

trans-unit.source: The Streams API is experimental, and support is at an early stage right now. You can consume Fetch bodys as streams and create your own custom readable streams in the latest versions of Firefox (58+, currently hidden behind the dom.streams.enabled and javascript.options.streams prefs) and Chrome (52+). Pipe chains are only supported in Chrome at the moment, and that functionality is subject to change.
trans-unit.target: Streams API是试验性的，支持目前处于早期阶段。您可以将Fetch主体用作流，并在最新版本的Firefox（58+，当前隐藏在 dom.streams.enabled 和 javascript.options.streams 首选项之后）和Chrome（52+）中创建自己的自定义可读流。目前，Chrome仅支持管道链，并且此功能可能会发生变化。

trans-unit.source: The Streams API makes it possible to pipe streams into one another (or at least it will do when browsers implement the relevant functionality) using a structure called a pipe chain. There are two methods available in the spec to facilitate this:
trans-unit.target: 使用Streams API，可以使用称为管道链的结构将流以管道方式相互流传（或至少在浏览器实现相关功能时才能这样做）。规范中提供了两种方法来简化此操作：

trans-unit.source: The StylePropertyMapReadOnly thatforEach() is being called on.
trans-unit.target: forEach() 的StylePropertyMapReadOnly 被调用。

trans-unit.source: The SyncEvent interface represents a sync action that is dispatched on the ServiceWorkerGlobalScope of a ServiceWorker.
trans-unit.target: SyncEvent接口表示在 ServiceWorkerGlobalScope 的ServiceWorkerGlobalScope 上分派的同步操作。

trans-unit.source: The Timing Model is the backbone of working with the WAAPI. Each document has a master timeline, Document.timeline, which stretches from the moment the page is loaded to infinity — or until the window is closed. Spread along that timeline according to their durations are our animations. Each animation is anchored to a point in the timeline by its startTime, representing the moment along the document’s timeline when the animation starts playing.
trans-unit.target: 时序模型是使用WAAPI的基础。每个文档都有一个主时间轴 Document.timeline ，该时间轴从页面加载到无限（即直到窗口关闭）为止。根据它们的持续时间沿着时间线传播的是我们的动画。每个动画都通过其 startTime 固定在时间轴上的某个点，代表动画开始播放时沿文档时间轴的时刻。

trans-unit.source: The Two Models: Timing and Animation
trans-unit.target: 两种模式。定时和动画

trans-unit.source: The URL from which to retrieve payment handler specific verification information used to validate the merchant. This is an empty string by default.
trans-unit.target: URL,用于检索用于验证商家的支付处理程序特定验证信息。默认情况下,这是一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The URL interface represents an object providing static methods used for creating object URLs.
trans-unit.target: URL接口代表一个对象,提供用于创建对象URL的静态方法。

trans-unit.source: The URL is malformed. Make sure that the URL is complete and valid.
trans-unit.target: URL是错误的。确保URL完整有效。

trans-unit.source: The URL of an image to be displayed as part of the notification, as specified in the constructor's options parameter.
trans-unit.target: 要在通知中显示的图像的URL，在构造函数的 options 参数中指定。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the client as a string.
trans-unit.target: 客户端的URL是一个字符串。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the document initiating the change.
trans-unit.target: 启动变更的文件的URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the document whose key changed. Read only.
trans-unit.target: key 更改的文档的URL 。只读。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the handler, as a string. This string should include "%s" as a placeholder which will be replaced with the escaped URL of the document to be handled. This URL might be a true URL, or it could be a phone number, email address, or so forth.
trans-unit.target: 处理程序的URL,作为一个字符串。这个字符串应该包括"%s "作为占位符,它将被替换为要处理的文档的转义URL。这个URL可能是一个真实的URL,也可能是一个电话号码、电子邮件地址等。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image used as an icon of the notification as specified in the constructor's options parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在构造函数的 options 参数中指定的用作通知图标的图像的URL 。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image used to represent the notification when there is not enough space to display the notification itself.
trans-unit.target: 当没有足够的空间显示通知本身时,用于表示通知的图片的URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the service worker script. The registered service worker file needs to have a valid JavaScript MIME type.
trans-unit.target: 服务工作者脚本的URL。注册的服务工作者文件必须具有有效的JavaScript MIME类型。

trans-unit.source: The URL passed to fetch needs to be relative
trans-unit.target: 传递给fetch的URL需要是相对的。

trans-unit.source: The URL scheme is not http or https.
trans-unit.target: URL方案不是 http 或 https 。

trans-unit.source: The URL that the new response is to originate from.
trans-unit.target: 新的响应来自的URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL to open in the new window. It must be on the same origin as the calling page.
trans-unit.target: 在新窗口中打开的URL。它必须与调用页面的来源相同。

trans-unit.source: The URL to which to connect; this should be the URL to which the WebSocket server will respond.
trans-unit.target: 要连接的 URL;这应该是 WebSocket 服务器将响应的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The UnimplementedIDBEnvironmentSync interface of the IndexedDB API will be implemented by worker objects.
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB API的未实现 IDBEnvironmentSync 接口将由辅助对象实现。

trans-unit.source: The W3C XMLHttpRequest specification adds HTML parsing support to XMLHttpRequest, which originally supported only XML parsing. This feature allows Web apps to obtain an HTML resource as a parsed DOM using XMLHttpRequest.
trans-unit.target: W3C XMLHttpRequest 规范向 XMLHttpRequest 添加了HTML解析支持，而XMLHttpRequest最初仅支持XML解析。此功能允许Web应用程序使用 XMLHttpRequest 获得HTML资源作为已解析的DOM。

trans-unit.source: The W3C DOM API, supported by Mozilla, can be used to create an in-memory representation of this document like so:
trans-unit.target: 由Mozilla支持的W3C DOM API可以用来创建这个文档的内存表示,就像这样。

trans-unit.source: The W3C DOM Level 1 allows you to change the content tree any way you want. It is powerful enough to build any HTML document from scratch. It allows authors to change anything in the document from script, at any time. The easiest way for web page authors to change the DOM dynamically is using JavaScript. In JavaScript, the document is accessible the same way it has been in older browsers: from the document property of the global object. This document object implements the Document interface from the W3C's DOM Level 1 spec.
trans-unit.target: 在W3C DOM级别1允许您更改内容的树，你想要的任何方式。它足够强大，可以从头开始构建任何HTML文档。它允许作者随时从脚本更改文档中的任何内容。网页作者动态更改DOM的最简单方法是使用JavaScript。在JavaScript中，文档的访问方式与旧版浏览器中的访问方式相同：可从全局对象的 document 属性访问。该 document 对象实现了W3C的DOM Level 1规范中的Document接口。

trans-unit.source: The W3C DOM Level 1 allows you to change the content tree any way you want. It is powerful enough to build any HTML document from scratch. It allows authors to change anything in the document from script, at any time. The easiest way for web page authors to change the DOM dynamically is using JavaScript. In JavaScript, the document is accessible the same way it has been in older browsers: from the document property of the global object. This document object implements the Document interface from the W3C's DOM Level 1 spec.
The W3C specification is a latest of a previous version of HTML Living Standard
trans-unit.target: W3C规范是HTML Living Standard先前版本的最新版本。

trans-unit.source: The W3C's DOM Level 1 Core is a powerful object model for changing the content tree of documents. It is supported in all major browsers including Mozilla Firefox and Microsoft Internet Explorer. It is a powerful base for scripting on the web.
trans-unit.target: W3C的DOM Level 1 Core是一个强大的对象模型,用于改变文档的内容树。它被所有主要的浏览器所支持,包括Mozilla Firefox和Microsoft Internet Explorer。它是网络上脚本的强大基础。

trans-unit.source: The W3C's DOM Level 1 Recommendation only specified the hasFeature method, which is one way to determine if a DOM module is supported by a browser (see example above and What does your user agent claim to support?). If available, other DOMImplementation methods provide services for controlling things outside of a single document. For example, the DOMImplementation interface includes a createDocumentType method with which DTDs can be created for one or more documents managed by the implementation.
trans-unit.target: W3C的DOM级别1建议仅指定 hasFeature 方法，这是确定浏览器是否支持DOM模块的一种方法（请参见上面的示例，以及您的用户代理声称支持什么？）。如果可用，其他 DOMImplementation 方法可提供用于控制单个文档外部内容的服务。例如， DOMImplementation 接口包括 createDocumentType 方法，通过该方法可以为实现所管理的一个或多个文档创建DTD。

trans-unit.source: The W3C's DOM Level 1 Recommendation only specified the hasFeature method, which is one way to determine if a DOM module is supported by a browser (see example above and What does your user agent claim to support?). If available, other DOMImplementation methods provide services for controlling things outside of a single document. For example, the DOMImplementation interface includes a createDocumentType method with which DTDs can be created for one or more documents managed by the implementation.
The Web Animation API has a polyfill that you can use today.
trans-unit.target: Web Animation API具有您现在可以使用的polyfill。

trans-unit.source: The Web Animations API (WAAPI) provides JavaScript developers access to the browser’s animation engine and describes how animations should be implemented across browsers. This article will introduce you to the important concepts behind the WAAPI, providing you with a theoretical understanding of how it works so you can use it effectively. To learn how to put the API to use, check out its sister article, Using the Web Animations API.
trans-unit.target: Web动画API（WAAPI）为JavaScript开发人员提供了访问浏览器动画引擎的权限，并描述了如何在浏览器中实现动画。本文将向您介绍WAAPI背后的重要概念，从理论上了解其工作原理，以便您可以有效地使用它。要了解如何使用该API，请查看其姊妹文章“ 使用Web动画API”。

trans-unit.source: The Web Animations API adds some new features to document and element.
trans-unit.target: Web Animations API向 document 和 element 添加了一些新功能。

trans-unit.source: The Web Animations API allows for synchronizing and timing changes to the presentation of a Web page, i.e. animation of DOM elements. It does so by combining two models: the Timing Model and the Animation Model.
trans-unit.target: Web Animations API允许同步和定时改变一个网页的表现,即DOM元素的动画。它通过结合两个模型来实现:定时模型和动画模型。

trans-unit.source: The Web Animations API fills the gap between declarative CSS animations and transitions, and dynamic JavaScript animations. This means we can use it to create and manipulate CSS-like animations that go from one pre-defined state to another, or we can use variables, loops, and callbacks to create interactive animations that adapt and react to changing inputs.
trans-unit.target: Web Animations API 填补了声明式 CSS 动画和过渡以及动态 JavaScript 动画之间的空白。这意味着我们可以用它来创建和操作类似CSS的动画,从一个预定义的状态到另一个,或者我们可以使用变量、循环和回调来创建交互式的动画,以适应和反应不断变化的输入。

trans-unit.source: The Web Animations API is supported to varying degrees in Chrome and Firefox, while Safari has begun showing portions of it in technology previews and Edge has moved the API into a medium priority backlog. Because it is such a large API and it is being implemented piecemeal across the board, sites like caniuse.com cannot convey the granularity and nuances of support across browsers. For now, MDN remains one of the best places to check for feature support.
trans-unit.target: Chrome和Firefox在不同程度上支持Web动画API，而Safari已开始在技术预览中显示其部分内容，Edge将API移入了中等优先级的待办事项列表中。因为它是如此大的API，并且是逐块实施的，所以caniuse.com之类的网站无法在各个浏览器之间传达支持的粒度和细微差别。目前，MDN仍然是检查功能支持的最佳场所之一。

trans-unit.source: The Web Animations API lets us construct animations and control their playback with JavaScript. This article will start you off in the right direction with fun demos and tutorials featuring Alice in Wonderland.
trans-unit.target: Web Animations API 让我们可以用 JavaScript 构建动画并控制其播放。本文将以爱丽丝梦游仙境为主题的有趣演示和教程,让你在正确的方向上起步。

trans-unit.source: The Web Animations API provides a common language for browsers and developers to describe animations on DOM elements. To get more information on the concepts behind the API and how to use it, read Using the Web Animations API.
trans-unit.target: Web动画API为浏览器和开发人员提供了一种通用语言，以描述DOM元素上的动画。要获取有关API背后的概念以及如何使用它的更多信息，请阅读使用Web动画API。

trans-unit.source: The Web Animations API runs on top of two models, one that handles time—Timing—and one that handles visual change over time—Animation. The Timing Model keeps track of how far along a set timeline we've come. The Animation Model determines what the animated object should look like at any given time.
trans-unit.target: Web Animations API在两种模型上运行，一种处理时间（时间），一种处理随时间的视觉变化（动画）。计时模型跟踪我们沿着设定的时间表走了多远。动画模型确定动画对象在任何给定时间的外观。

trans-unit.source: The Web Animations API's cancel() method of the Animation interface clears all KeyframeEffects caused by this animation and aborts its playback.
trans-unit.target: 网络动画API的 cancel() 的方法 Animation 界面清除所有 KeyframeEffect 由此引起的动画S和终止其播放。

trans-unit.source: The Web Audio API also allows us to control how audio is spatialized. Using a system based on a source-listener model, it allows control of the panning model and deals with distance-induced attenuation or doppler shift induced by a moving source (or moving listener).
trans-unit.target: Web Audio API还允许我们控制音频的空间化方式。使用基于源侦听器模型的系统，它可以控制平移模型，并处理由移动的源（或移动的侦听器）引起的距离引起的衰减或多普勒频移。

trans-unit.source: The Web Audio API can seem intimidating to those that aren't familiar with audio or music terms, and as it incorporates a great deal of functionality it can prove difficult to get started if you are a developer.
trans-unit.target: 对于那些不熟悉音频或音乐术语的人来说,网络音频API似乎很吓人,而且由于它包含了大量的功能,如果你是开发人员,可能会证明很难上手。

trans-unit.source: The Web Audio API does not replace the <audio> media element, but rather complements it, just like <canvas> coexists alongside the <img> element. Your use case will determine what tools you use to implement audio. If you simply want to control playback of an audio track, the <audio> media element provides a better, quicker solution than the Web Audio API. If you want to carry out more complex audio processing, as well as playback, the Web Audio API provides much more power and control.
trans-unit.target: Web Audio API不会替换<audio>媒体元素，而是对其进行补充，就像<canvas>与<img>元素并存一样。您的用例将确定您使用哪些工具来实现音频。如果只想控制音频轨道的播放，则<audio>媒体元素提供了比Web Audio API更好，更快的解决方案。如果您想执行更复杂的音频处理以及回放，则Web Audio API可以提供更多功能和控制。

trans-unit.source: The Web Audio API exposes only planar buffers, because it's made for processing. It works with planar, but converts the audio to interleaved when it is sent to the sound card for playback. Conversely, when an MP3 is decoded, it starts off in interleaved format, but is converted to planar for processing.
trans-unit.target: Web Audio API 仅公开平面缓冲区，因为它是为处理而设计的。它适用于平面，但在将其发送到声卡进行播放时，会将音频转换为交错的。相反，对MP3进行解码时，它以交错格式开始，但转换为平面格式进行处理。

trans-unit.source: The Web Audio API handles audio operations inside an audio context, and has been designed to allow modular routing. Basic audio operations are performed with audio nodes, which are linked together to form an audio routing graph. You have input nodes, which are the source of the sounds you are manipulating, modification nodes that change those sounds as desired, and output nodes (destinations), which allow you to save or hear those sounds.
trans-unit.target: Web Audio API处理音频上下文中的音频操作，并已设计为允许模块化路由。基本的音频操作是通过音频节点执行的，这些音频节点链接在一起形成一个音频路由图。您具有输入节点和输出节点（目的地），输入节点是要处理的声音的源，修改节点可以根据需要更改这些声音，输出节点（目的地）可以保存或听到这些声音。

trans-unit.source: The Web Audio API has a number of interfaces and associated events, which we have split up into nine categories of functionality.
trans-unit.target: 网络音频API有许多接口和相关的事件,我们将其分为九类功能。

trans-unit.source: The Web Audio API interface AudioParamMap represents a set of multiple audio parameters, each described as a mapping of a DOMString identifying the parameter to the AudioParam object representing its value.
trans-unit.target: Web音频API接口 AudioParamMap 表示一组多个音频参数，每个音频参数都描述为 DOMString 的映射，该映射标识该参数到表示其值的 AudioParam 对象。

trans-unit.source: The Web Audio API involves handling audio operations inside an audio context, and has been designed to allow modular routing. Basic audio operations are performed with audio nodes, which are linked together to form an audio routing graph. Several sources — with different types of channel layout — are supported even within a single context. This modular design provides the flexibility to create complex audio functions with dynamic effects.
trans-unit.target: Web Audio API涉及在音频上下文中处理音频操作，并且已设计为允许模块化路由。基本的音频操作是通过音频节点执行的，这些音频节点链接在一起形成一个音频路由图。即使在单个上下文中，也支持具有不同类型的通道布局的多个源。这种模块化设计提供了创建具有动态效果的复杂音频功能的灵活性。

trans-unit.source: The Web Audio API now comes with an IIRFilterNode interface. But what is this and how does it differ from the BiquadFilterNode we have already?
trans-unit.target: Web Audio API现在带有 IIRFilterNode 接口。但是，这是什么？它与我们已经拥有的 BiquadFilterNode 有何不同？

trans-unit.source: The Web Audio API provides a powerful and versatile system for controlling audio on the Web, allowing developers to choose audio sources, add effects to audio, create audio visualizations, apply spatial effects (such as panning) and much more.
trans-unit.target: Web Audio API为控制Web上的音频提供了一个强大而通用的系统,允许开发人员选择音频源、为音频添加效果、创建音频可视化、应用空间效果(如平移)等等。

trans-unit.source: The Web Audio API specification is constantly evolving and like most things on the web, there are some issues with it working consistently across browsers. Here we'll look at options for getting around cross-browser problems.
trans-unit.target: 网络音频API规范在不断地发展,就像网络上的大多数东西一样,它在跨浏览器的工作中也存在一些问题。在这里,我们将看一下解决跨浏览器问题的选择。

trans-unit.source: The Web Audio API uses a planar buffer format. The left and right channels are stored like this:
trans-unit.target: 网络音频API使用平面缓冲区格式。左、右声道的存储方式是这样的。

trans-unit.source: The Web Audio API's AudioParam interface represents an audio-related parameter, usually a parameter of an AudioNode (such as GainNode.gain). An AudioParam can be set to a specific value or a change in value, and can be scheduled to happen at a specific time and following a specific pattern.
trans-unit.target: Web Audio API的 AudioParam 接口表示与音频有关的参数，通常是 AudioNode 的参数（例如 GainNode.gain ）。一个 AudioParam 可以设置为特定值或值的变化，并且可以预定在特定模式下的具体时间和发生。

trans-unit.source: The Web Authentication API (also referred to as WebAuthn) uses asymmetric (public-key) cryptography instead of passwords or SMS texts for registering, authenticating, and second-factor authentication with websites. This resolves significant security problems related to phishing, data breaches, and attacks against SMS texts or other second-factor authentication methods while at the same time significantly increasing ease of use (since users don't have to manage dozens of increasingly complicated passwords).
trans-unit.target: Web身份验证API（也称为WebAuthn）使用非对称（公钥）密码术代替密码或SMS文本来向网站进行注册，身份验证和二次身份验证。这解决了与网络钓鱼，数据泄露以及对SMS文本或其他第二身份验证方法的攻击有关的重大安全问题，同时显着提高了易用性（因为用户不必管理数十个日益复杂的密码）。

trans-unit.source: The Web Authentication API is an extension of the Credential Management API that enables strong authentication with public key cryptography, enabling passwordless authentication and/or secure second-factor authentication without SMS texts.
trans-unit.target: Web身份验证API是凭据管理API的扩展，可通过公钥加密实现强身份验证，从而实现无密码身份验证和/或安全的第二因素身份验证，而无需SMS文本。

trans-unit.source: The Web Crypto API can be used:
trans-unit.target: 可以使用Web Crypto API。

trans-unit.source: The Web Speech API enables you to incorporate voice data into web apps. The Web Speech API has two parts: SpeechSynthesis (Text-to-Speech), and SpeechRecognition (Asynchronous Speech Recognition.)
trans-unit.target: Web Speech API使您能够将语音数据整合到网络应用中。Web Speech API有两个部分。语音合成(文本到语音)和语音识别(异步语音识别)。

trans-unit.source: The Web Speech API has a main controller interface for this — SpeechRecognition — plus a number of closely-related interfaces for representing grammar, results, etc. Generally, the default speech recognition system available on the device will be used for the speech recognition — most modern OSes have a speech recognition system for issuing voice commands. Think about Dictation on Mac OS X, Siri on iOS, Cortana on Windows 10, Android Speech, etc.
trans-unit.target: Web语音API为此具有一个主控制器接口 SpeechRecognition 以及用于表示语法，结果等的许多紧密相关的接口。通常，设备上可用的默认语音识别系统将用于语音识别-大多数现代操作系统具有用于发出语音命令的语音识别系统。考虑一下Mac OS X上的听写，iOS上的Siri，Windows 10上的Cortana，Android Speech等。

trans-unit.source: The Web Speech API has a main controller interface for this — SpeechSynthesis — plus a number of closely-related interfaces for representing text to be synthesised (known as utterances), voices to be used for the utterance, etc. Again, most OSes have some kind of speech synthesis system, which will be used by the API for this task as available.
trans-unit.target: Web Speech API为此具有一个主控制器接口 SpeechSynthesis 以及许多紧密相关的接口，用于表示要合成的文本（称为发声），用于发声的语音等。同样，大多数OS都有一些一种语音合成系统，API会使用它来完成此任务。

trans-unit.source: The Web Speech API makes web apps able to handle voice data. There are two components to this API:
trans-unit.target: Web Speech API使网络应用能够处理语音数据。这个API有两个组成部分。

trans-unit.source: The Web Speech API provides two distinct areas of functionality — speech recognition, and speech synthesis (also known as text to speech, or tts) — which open up interesting new possibilities for accessibility, and control mechanisms. This article provides a simple introduction to both areas, along with demos.
trans-unit.target: Web语音API提供了两个不同的功能区域-语音识别和语音合成（也称为文本到语音，即tts）-为可访问性和控制机制打开了有趣的新可能性。本文提供了这两个领域的简单介绍以及演示。

trans-unit.source: The Web Storage API extends the Window object with two new properties — Window.sessionStorage and Window.localStorage — which provide access to the current domain's session and local Storage objects respectively, and a Window.onstorage event handler that fires when a storage area changes (e.g. a new item is stored.)
trans-unit.target: Web Storage API 用两个新属性扩展了 Window 对象，即 Window.sessionStorage 和 Window.localStorage ，它们分别提供对当前域的会话和本地 Storage 对象的访问，以及一个 Window.onstorage 事件处理程序，该事件处理程序在存储区域更改时触发（例如，存储了一个新项目。）

trans-unit.source: The Web Storage API provides mechanisms by which browsers can securely store key/value pairs, in a much more intuitive fashion than using cookies.
trans-unit.target: 网络存储API提供了浏览器可以安全存储密钥/值对的机制,其方式比使用cookies更直观。

trans-unit.source: The WebGL API provides methods to use compressed texture formats. These are useful to increase texture detail while limiting the additional video memory necessary. By default, no compressed formats are available: a corresponding compressed texture format extension must first be enabled.
trans-unit.target: WebGL API提供了使用压缩纹理格式的方法。这些方法有助于增加纹理细节,同时限制必要的额外视频内存。默认情况下,没有压缩格式可用:必须首先启用相应的压缩纹理格式扩展。

trans-unit.source: The WebGL context
trans-unit.target: WebGL上下文

trans-unit.source: The WebGL context supports querying what extensions are available.
trans-unit.target: WebGL上下文支持查询哪些扩展是可用的。

trans-unit.source: The WebRTC API includes a number of interfaces to manage security and identity.
trans-unit.target: WebRTC API包括一些管理安全和身份的接口。

trans-unit.source: The WebRTC API interface RTCTrackEvent's read-only transceiver property indicates the RTCRtpTransceiver affiliated with the event's track. The transceiver pairs the track's receiver with an RTCRtpSender.
trans-unit.target: WebRTC API接口 RTCTrackEvent 的只读 transceiver 属性指示与事件的 track 关联的 RTCRtpTransceiver 。收发器将轨道的 receiver 与 RTCRtpSender 配对。

trans-unit.source: The WebRTC API makes heavy use of Promises. They make it very easy to chain the steps of the connection process together; if you haven't already read up on this functionality of ECMAScript 2015, you should read up on them. Similarly, this example uses arrow functions to simplify syntax.
trans-unit.target: WebRTC API大量使用 Promise 。它们使将连接过程的各个步骤链接在一起非常容易。如果您尚未阅读ECMAScript 2015的此功能，则应阅读它们。同样，此示例使用箭头函数简化语法。

trans-unit.source: The WebRTC API's RTCTrackEventInit dictionary is used to provide information describing an RTCTrackEvent when instantiating a new track event using new RTCTrackEvent().
trans-unit.target: 当使用 new RTCTrackEvent() 实例化新的 track 事件时，WebRTC API的 RTCTrackEventInit 词典用于提供描述 RTCTrackEvent 的信息。

trans-unit.source: The WebRTC adapter currently supports Firefox, Google Chrome, and Microsoft Edge.
trans-unit.target: WebRTC适配器目前支持Firefox、Google Chrome和Microsoft Edge。

trans-unit.source: The WebRTC adapter project on GitHub
trans-unit.target: GitHub上的WebRTC适配器项目

trans-unit.source: The WebRTC infrastructure sends you the signalingstatechange message when the state of the signaling process changes (or if the connection to the signaling server changes). See Signaling state to see our code.
trans-unit.target: 当信令过程的状态发生更改（或与信令服务器的连接发生更改）时，WebRTC基础结构会向您发送 signalingstatechange 消息。请参阅信令状态以查看我们的代码。

trans-unit.source: The WebRTC interface RTCRtpTransceiver describes a permanent pairing of an RTCRtpSender and an RTCRtpReceiver, along with some shared state.
trans-unit.target: 所述的WebRTC接口 RTCRtpTransceiver 描述了一种永久配对 RTCRtpSender 和 RTCRtpReceiver ，具有某些共享状态一起。

trans-unit.source: The WebRTC organization provides on GitHub the WebRTC adapter to work around compatibility issues in different browsers' WebRTC implementations. The adapter is a JavaScript shim which lets your code to be written to the specification so that it will "just work" in all browsers with WebRTC support.
trans-unit.target: WebRTC组织在GitHub上提供WebRTC适配器，以解决不同浏览器的WebRTC实现中的兼容性问题。适配器是JavaScript填充程序，可让您将代码写入规范，以便在支持WebRTC的所有浏览器中“正常工作”。

trans-unit.source: The WebVR API is a fantastic addition to the web developer's toolkit, allowing WebGL scenes to be presented in virtual reality displays such as the Oculus Rift and HTC Vive. But how do you get started with developing VR apps for the Web? This article will guide you through the basics.
trans-unit.target: WebVR API是Web开发者工具包的一个奇妙补充,它允许WebGL场景在Oculus Rift和HTC Vive等虚拟现实显示器中呈现。但如何开始为Web开发VR应用呢?本文将指导你完成基础知识的学习。

trans-unit.source: The above code solves a few usability problems related to links opening secondary window. The purpose of the return false in the code is to cancel default action of the link: if the onclick event handler is executed, then there is no need to execute the default action of the link. But if javascript support is disabled or non-existent on the user's browser, then the onclick event handler is ignored and the browser loads the referenced resource in the target frame or window that has the name "PromoteFirefoxWindowName". If no frame nor window has the name "PromoteFirefoxWindowName", then the browser will create a new window and will name it "PromoteFirefoxWindowName".
trans-unit.target: 上面的代码解决了一些与打开辅助窗口的链接有关的可用性问题。代码中 return false 的目的是取消链接的默认操作：如果执行了onclick事件处理程序，则无需执行链接的默认操作。但是，如果用户浏览器中的javascript支持被禁用或不存在，则onclick事件处理程序将被忽略，浏览器会将引用的资源加载到名称为“ PromoteFirefoxWindowName”的目标框架或窗口中。如果没有框架或窗口都没有名称“ PromoteFirefoxWindowName”，则浏览器将创建一个新窗口并将其命名为“ PromoteFirefoxWindowName”。

trans-unit.source: The ambient light events are a handy way to make a web page or an application aware of any change in the light intensity. It allows them to react to such a change, for example by changing the color contrast of the User Interface (UI) or by changing the exposure necessary to take a picture.
trans-unit.target: 环境光事件是一种方便的方法,可以让网页或应用程序意识到光强度的任何变化。它允许他们对这种变化做出反应,例如通过改变用户界面(UI)的颜色对比度或改变拍照所需的曝光度。

trans-unit.source: The amount of acceleration along the X axis. Read only.
trans-unit.target: 沿X轴的加速度。只读。

trans-unit.target: 沿Z轴的加速度。只读。

trans-unit.source: The amount of data that has been retrieved has changed.
trans-unit.target: 检索到的数据量发生了变化。

trans-unit.source: The amount of pressure applied to a touch or tablet device when generating the event; this value ranges between 0.0 (minimum pressure) and 1.0 (maximum pressure).
trans-unit.target: 生成事件时施加到触摸或平板设备的压力大小；该值介于 0.0 （最小压力）和 1.0 （最大压力）之间。

trans-unit.source: The amount of pressure applied to the pointer.
trans-unit.target: 指针所承受的压力大小。

trans-unit.source: The amount of pressure applied when clicking
trans-unit.target: 点击时的压力大小

trans-unit.source: The amount of rotation around the X axis, in degrees per second.
trans-unit.target: 围绕X轴的旋转量,单位是每秒的度数。

trans-unit.source: The amount of rotation around the Y axis, in degrees per second.
trans-unit.target: 围绕Y轴的旋转量,单位是每秒的度数。

trans-unit.source: The amount of rotation around the Z axis, in degrees per second.
trans-unit.target: 围绕Z轴的旋转量,单位是每秒的度数。

trans-unit.source: The amount of scrolling that has been done of the viewport area (or any other scrollable element) is taken into account when computing the bounding rectangle. This means that the rectangle's boundary edges (top, right, bottom, left) change their values every time the scrolling position changes (because their values are relative to the viewport and not absolute). If you need the bounding rectangle relative to the top-left corner of the document, just add the current scrolling position to the top and left properties (these can be obtained using window.scrollX and window.scrollY) to get a bounding rectangle which is independent from the current scrolling position.
trans-unit.target: 在计算边界矩形时，应考虑到视口区域（或任何其他可滚动元素）已完成的滚动量。这意味着每次滚动位置更改时，矩形的边界边（上，右，下，左）都会更改其值（因为其值是相对于视口而不是绝对的）。如果您需要相对于文档左上角的边界矩形，只需将当前滚动位置添加到 top 和 left 属性（可以使用 window.scrollX 和 window.scrollY 获得）即可得到一个边界矩形。与当前滚动位置无关。

trans-unit.source: The amount of scrolling that has been done of the viewport area (or any other scrollable element) is taken into account when computing the rectangles.
trans-unit.target: 在计算矩形时,会考虑到视口区域(或任何其他可滚动元素)的滚动量。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time, in milliseconds, that each DTMF tone should last. This value must be between 40 ms and 6000 ms (6 seconds), inclusive. The default is 100 ms.
trans-unit.target: 每個DTMF音的持續時間,以毫秒為單位。该值必须在40毫秒和6000毫秒(6秒)之间,包括在内。默认值是100毫秒。

trans-unit.source: The analyser node will then capture audio data using a Fast Fourier Transform (fft) in a certain frequency domain, depending on what you specify as the AnalyserNode.fftSize property value (if no value is specified, the default is 2048.)
trans-unit.target: 然后，分析器节点将在特定频域中使用快速傅立叶变换（fft）捕获音频数据，具体取决于您指定为 AnalyserNode.fftSize 属性值的属性（如果未指定任何值，则默认值为2048。）

trans-unit.source: The anchor of a selection is the beginning point of the selection. When making a selection with a mouse, the anchor is where in the document the mouse button is initially pressed. As the user changes the selection using the mouse or the keyboard, the anchor does not move.
trans-unit.target: 选区的锚点是选区的起始点。当用鼠标进行选择时,锚点是文档中最初按下鼠标按钮的位置。当用户使用鼠标或键盘改变选区时,锚点不会移动。

trans-unit.source: The angle at which the arc ends, measured clockwise from the positive x-axis and expressed in radians.
trans-unit.target: 弧线结束的角度,从正x轴顺时针测量,用弧度表示。

trans-unit.source: The angle at which the arc starts, measured clockwise from the positive x-axis and expressed in radians.

trans-unit.target: 椭圆结束的角度,从正x轴顺时针测量,用弧度表示。

trans-unit.source: The angle at which the ellipse starts, measured clockwise from the positive x-axis and expressed in radians.
trans-unit.target: 椭圆开始的角度,从正x轴顺时针测量,用弧度表示。

trans-unit.source: The angle between the X-Z plane of the pointer (stylus) and the screen.
trans-unit.target: 指针(触控笔)的X-Z平面与屏幕之间的角度。

trans-unit.source: The angle between the Y-Z plane of the pointer (stylus) and the screen.
trans-unit.target: 指针(触控笔)的Y-Z平面与屏幕之间的角度。

trans-unit.source: The animation completed.
trans-unit.target: 动画完成。

trans-unit.source: The animation has reached one of its boundaries and the Animation.currentTime property is not updating.
trans-unit.target: 动画已达到其边界之一，并且 Animation.currentTime 属性未更新。

trans-unit.source: The animation has started.
trans-unit.target: 动画已经开始了。

trans-unit.source: The animation is running.
trans-unit.target: 动画正在运行。

trans-unit.source: The animation model can be thought of as an array of snapshots of what the animation could look like at any given time, lined up along the duration of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 动画模型可以被认为是动画在任何给定时间的快照阵列,沿着动画的持续时间排列。

trans-unit.source: The animation runs backwards, or "rewinds."
trans-unit.target: 动画向后运行,或者说 "倒带"。

trans-unit.source: The animation runs forwards, from beginning to end, in the way we experience the flow of time.
trans-unit.target: 动画从头到尾,以我们体验时间流动的方式向前运行。

trans-unit.source: The animation sequence is described next. First, the "slideAnimation" class, which establishes the animation that will cause the box to move over the course of five seconds, one time, using the "slideBox" keyframe set. The keyframes are defined next; they describe an animation which causes the box to migrate from the top-left corner of the container to the bottom-right corner.
trans-unit.target: 接下来描述动画序列。首先， "slideAnimation" 类使用 "slideBox" 关键帧集建立 animation ，该动画将使框一次移动五秒钟。接下来定义关键帧。它们描述了一种动画，该动画使框从容器的左上角移至右下角。

trans-unit.source: The animation switches direction after each iteration, going forward through the animation sequence the first iteration, then backward through the sequence the second iteration, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 每次迭代后,动画都会切换方向,第一次迭代时通过动画序列向前走,第二次迭代时通过序列向后走,以此类推。

trans-unit.source: The animation was suspended and the Animation.currentTime property is not updating.
trans-unit.target: 动画已暂停，并且 Animation.currentTime 属性未更新。

trans-unit.source: The animation's currentTime is unresolved (for example, if it's never been played or isn't currently playing) and the end time of the animation is positive infinity.
trans-unit.target: 动画的 currentTime 的是 unresolved （例如，如果它从未播放过或目前没有播放）和动画的结束时间是正无穷大。

trans-unit.source: The animation's effects are only visible while the animation is iterating or its playhead is positioned over an iteration. The animation's effects are not visible when its playState is pending with a delay, when its playState is finished, or during its endDelay or delay. In other words, if the animation isn't in its active interval, the affected element is not visible.
trans-unit.target: 动画的效果仅在动画进行迭代或其播放头位于迭代上方时可见。当其动画的效果是不可见的 playState 被 pending 了 delay ，当其 playState 被 finished ，或它在 endDelay 或 delay 。换句话说，如果动画不在其活动间隔中，则受影响的元素将不可见。

trans-unit.source: The animation's effects should be reflected by the element(s) state prior to playing, in spite of and during any delay and pendingplayState.
trans-unit.target: 尽管有任何 delay 和 pending playState ，但在播放期间，动画效果应由播放前的元素状态反映。

trans-unit.source: The animation's keyframes are defined next; they describe an animation which causes the box to migrate from the top-left corner of the container to the bottom-right corner.
trans-unit.target: 接下来定义了动画的关键帧,它们描述了一个使盒子从容器的左上角迁移到右下角的动画。

trans-unit.source: The animation's keyframes are described next, plotting a course from the top-left corner of the content box to the bottom-right corner.
trans-unit.target: 接下来介绍一下动画的关键帧,从内容框的左上角到右下角绘制一个路线。

trans-unit.source: The answerer side of the connection will automatically begin ICE restart when new values are detected for the ICE ufrag and ICE password.
trans-unit.target: 当检测到ICE ufrag和ICE密码有新的值时,连接的应答方会自动开始ICE重启。

trans-unit.source: The app looked up an entry, but the entry found is of the wrong type. For example, the app is asking for a directory, when the entry is really a file.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序查找了一个条目,但找到的条目类型错误。例如,应用程序要求输入一个目录,而该条目实际上是一个文件。

trans-unit.source: The application is free to include any number of data items in a drag operation. Each data item is a string of a particular type, typically a MIME type such as text/html.
trans-unit.target: 该应用程序可以自由地在拖动操作中包含任意数量的数据项。每个数据项都是特定 type 的 string ，通常是MIME类型，例如 text/html 。

trans-unit.target: 该应用程序对触摸区域使用 <div> 元素，并提供用于启用日志记录和清除日志的按钮。

trans-unit.source: The arc begins at the point specified by moveTo(): (230, 20). It is shaped to fit control points at (90, 130) and (20, 20), and has a radius of 50. The lineTo() method connects the arc to (20, 20) with a straight line. Note that the arc's second control point and the point specified by lineTo() are the same, which produces a totally smooth corner.
trans-unit.target: 圆弧从 moveTo() 指定的点开始：（230，20）。它的形状适合（90，130）和（20，20）的控制点，并且半径为 lineTo() 方法通过一条直线将圆弧连接到（20，20）。请注意，圆弧的第二个控制点与 lineTo() 指定的点相同，这将产生一个完全平滑的角。

trans-unit.source: The arc is given an x coordinate of 100, a y coordinate of 75, and a radius of 50. To make a full circle, the arc begins at an angle of 0 radians (0°), and ends at an angle of 2π radians (360°).
trans-unit.target: 圆弧的x坐标为100，y坐标为75，半径为50。要形成一个完整的圆，圆弧的起点为0弧度（0 °），终点为2π弧度（ 360 °）。

trans-unit.source: The arc's radius. Must be non-negative.
trans-unit.target: 弧线的半径。必须为非负值。

trans-unit.source: The argument callback is a function that will be called asynchronously with true as the only argument if HTML parsing is supported and false as the only argument if HTML parsing is not supported.

trans-unit.source: The array (arr) has a length of 40000: it consists of 10,000 pixels, each of which is defined by 4 values. The ImageData constructor specifies a width of 200 for the new object, so its height defaults to 10,000 divided by 200, which is 50.
trans-unit.target: 数组（ arr ）的长度为 40000 ：由10,000个像素组成，每个像素由4个值定义。所述 ImageData 构造函数指定一个 width 的 200 为新对象，因此它的 height 默认为万200，其被划分 50 。

trans-unit.source: The array redrawList will be used to keep a list of all the ads which need to be redrawn during this refresh cycle, since it may not be exactly the same as the elapsed time due to system activity or because you've set the interval to something other than every 1000 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: redrawList 数组将用于保存在此​​刷新周期内需要重新绘制的所有广告的列表，因为由于系统活动或由于您将间隔设置为某个时间，它可能与经过的时间不完全相同除了每1000毫秒。

trans-unit.target: 接下来创建一个顶点数组，作​​为一个 Float32Array ，每个三角形要绘制六个坐标（三个2D顶点），总共12个值。

trans-unit.source: The array that forEach() is being applied to.

trans-unit.source: The article "domInteractive: is it? really?" explaining when you can use this property as a proxy for the user experience of loading a Web site.
trans-unit.target: 文章“ domInteractive：是吗？真的吗？ ”解释了何时可以使用此属性作为代理来加载网站的用户体验。

trans-unit.source: The articles below provide additional guidance and how-to information that will help you learn to use the API, and how to perform specific tasks that you may wish to handle.
trans-unit.target: 下面的文章提供了额外的指导和如何操作的信息,这些信息将帮助您学习使用API,以及如何执行您可能希望处理的特定任务。

trans-unit.source: The assertion is returned through the WebAuthn API as the AuthenticatorAssertionResponse. The assertion format is fairly simple as it contains four basic ArrayBuffers:
trans-unit.target: 该断言通过WebAuthn API作为AuthenticatorAssertionResponse返回。断言格式非常简单，因为它包含四个基本的ArrayBuffer：

trans-unit.source: The associated
trans-unit.target: 相关的

trans-unit.source: The associated ReadableByteStreamController.
trans-unit.target: 关联的 ReadableByteStreamController 。

trans-unit.source: The associated ReadableStream was constructed with autoAllocateChunkSize set, but its value is not an integer or below 0.
trans-unit.target: 关联的 ReadableStream 是使用 autoAllocateChunkSize 设置的，但其值不是整数或小于0。

trans-unit.source: The associated RTCRtpTransceiver has its currentDirection updated to include sending; if its current value is "recvonly", it becomes "sendrecv", and if its current value is "inactive", it becomes "sendonly".
trans-unit.target: 关联的 RTCRtpTransceiver 的 currentDirection 已更新为包括发送；如果当前值是 "recvonly" ，则变为 "sendrecv" ，如果当前值是 "inactive" ，则变为 "sendonly" 。

trans-unit.source: The associated resource or media provider object (such as a MediaStream) has been found to be unsuitable.
trans-unit.target: 发现相关的资源或媒体提供者对象（例如 MediaStream ）不合适。

trans-unit.source: The associated resource or media provider object (such as a MediaStream) has been found to be unsuitable.
trans-unit.target: 发现相关的资源或媒体提供者对象（例如 MediaStream ）不合适。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous clipboard API is a relatively recent addition, and the process of implementing it in browsers is not yet complete. Due to both potential security concerns and technical complexities, the process of integrating this API is happening gradually in most browsers.
trans-unit.target: 异步剪贴板API是一个相对较新的功能,在浏览器中实现它的过程还没有完成。由于潜在的安全问题和技术上的复杂性,在大多数浏览器中,整合这一API的过程正在逐步进行。

trans-unit.source: The attestation is returned through the WebAuthn API as the AuthenticatorAttestationResponse. The attestation format contains two basic ArrayBuffers:
trans-unit.target: 该证明通过WebAuthn API作为AuthenticatorAttestationResponse返回。证明格式包含两个基本的ArrayBuffer：

trans-unit.source: The attribute's name.
trans-unit.target: 属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: The attribute's value.

trans-unit.source: The attributes tabindex and accesskey, are now defined on HTMLElement.
trans-unit.target: 属性 tabindex 和 accesskey 现在在 HTMLElement 上定义。

trans-unit.target: 现在在 HTMLElement 上定义了属性 tabindex 和 accesskey 以及方法 blur() 和 focus() 。

trans-unit.source: The audio is involved in interactive elements, such as responding to user actions or needing to coincide with visual cues such as a video or game action. The user agent should select the lowest possible latency that doesn't cause glitches in the audio. This is likely to require increased power consumption. This is the default value.
trans-unit.target: 音频包含在交互元素中，例如响应用户动作或需要与视觉提示（例如视频或游戏动作）一致。用户代理应选择不会引起音频故障的最低延迟。这可能需要增加功耗。这是默认值。

trans-unit.source: The audio is muted when the media plays backwards or if the fast forward or slow motion is outside a useful range (for example, Gecko mutes the sound outside the range 0.25 to 5.0).
trans-unit.target: 当媒体向后播放或快进或慢动作超出有用范围时，音频将静音（例如，Gecko将 0.25 到 5.0 范围之外的声音静音）。

trans-unit.source: The audio routing graph
trans-unit.target: 音频路由图

trans-unit.source: The audio transceiver's RTCRtpSender's replaceTrack() method is used to set the outgoing audio track to the first track of the microphone's audio stream.
trans-unit.target: 音频收发器的 RTCRtpSender 的 replaceTrack() 方法用于将传出音频轨道设置为麦克风音频流的第一轨道。

trans-unit.source: The audio transceiver's RTCRtpSender's track is replaced with the specified stream's first audio track.
trans-unit.target: 音频收发器的 RTCRtpSender 的轨道将替换为指定流的第一个音频轨道。

trans-unit.source: The audio transceiver's direction is set to "sendrecv", indicating that it should return to both sending and receiving streamed audio, instead of only sending.
trans-unit.target: 音频收发器的方向设置为 "sendrecv" ，指示它应返回到发送和接收流式音频，而不是仅发送。

trans-unit.source: The availability of full-screen mode can be controlled using Feature Policy. The full-screen mode feature is identified by the string "fullscreen", with a default allow-list value of "self", meaning that full-screen mode is permitted in top-level document contexts, as well as to nested browsing contexts loaded from the same origin as the top-most document.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用“ 功能策略”控制全屏模式的可用性。全屏模式功能由字符串 "fullscreen" 标识，默认允许列表值为 "self" ，这意味着在顶级文档上下文以及加载的嵌套浏览上下文中允许全屏模式与最顶层文档的来源相同。

trans-unit.source: The availability of most WebGL extensions depends on the client. When using WebGL extensions, if possible, try to make them optional by gracefully adapting to the case there they are not supported. Starting in Firefox 10, the webgl.disable-extensions preference allows simulating the absence of all extensions, to test portability.
trans-unit.target: 大多数WebGL扩展的可用性取决于客户端。使用WebGL扩展时，如果可能，请尝试通过适当地适应不支持它们的情况使它们成为可选。从Firefox 10开始， webgl.disable-extensions 首选项允许模拟所有扩展名的缺失，以测试可移植性。

trans-unit.source: The background color of the touch areas will change as follows: no active touches is white; one active touch is yellow; two simultaneous touches is ping and three or more simultaneous touches is lightblue.
trans-unit.target: 触摸区域的背景颜色将变化如下：没有活动的触摸为 white ；一种有效的触摸是 yellow ; 两次同时触摸为 ping 且三次或多次同时触摸为 lightblue 。

trans-unit.source: The background color of the touch areas will change as follows: no touch is white; one touch is yellow; two simultaneous touches is pink, and three or more simultaneous touches is lightblue. See touch move for information about the background color changing when a 2-finger move/pinch/zoom is detected.

trans-unit.source: The background elements also have playbackRates that are impacted when you click or tap. What happens when you make Alice and the Red Queen run twice as fast? What happens when you let them slow down?
trans-unit.target: 背景元素也有 playbackRate ■当您点击或点击所影响。当您使爱丽丝和红色女王的运行速度快两倍时会发生什么？如果让它们减速，会发生什么？

trans-unit.source: The backing store size in relation to the canvas element. See High DPI Canvas.
trans-unit.target: 与canvas元素相关的后备存储大小。请参阅高DPI画布。

The base 2 log of the absolute value of the maximum value that can be represented.

trans-unit.source: The basic Web Animations API features discussed in this article are available by default in Firefox 48+ and Chrome 36+. trans-unit.source: The basic usage of Streams hinges around making responses available as streams. For example, the response Body returned by a successful fetch request can be exposed as a ReadableStream, and you can then read it using a reader created with ReadableStream.getReader(), cancel it with ReadableStream.cancel(), etc.

trans-unit.source: The behavior of element.getElementsByTagNameNS changed between Firefox 3.5 and Firefox 3.6. In Firefox 3.5 and before, this function would automatically case-fold any queries so that a search for "foo" would match "Foo" or "foo". In Firefox 3.6 and later this function is now case-sensitive so that a query for "foo" will only match "foo" and not "Foo". For more background on this, please see the comment from Henri Sivonen about the change. You can also look at the relevant part of the standard, which states which parts of the API are case-sensitive and which parts aren't.
trans-unit.target: 在Firefox 3.5和Firefox 3.6之间， element.getElementsByTagNameNS 的行为发生了变化。在Firefox 3.5及更低版本中，此功能会自动对所有查询进行大小写折叠，以使搜索“ foo”与“ Foo”或“ foo”匹配。在Firefox 3.6及更高版本中，此功能现在区分大小写，因此对“ foo”的查询将仅与“ foo”匹配，而不与“ Foo”匹配。有关此背景的更多信息，请参见Henri Sivonen关于此更改的评论。您还可以查看标准的相关部分，其中指出API的哪些部分区分大小写，哪些部分不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The below polyfill will correct the input of the arguments of insertRule to standardize them in Internet Explorer 5–8. It supplements insertRule with a function that separates the selector from the rules before sending the arguments to the default native insertRule.

trans-unit.source: The below polyfill will only furfill the specs demanded by the W3 (no character encodings other than UTF-8 are supported, unfortunately ☹️). It is designed to work in IE5 "out of the box". However, in IE5-IE9, it will return a regular Array instead of a TypedArray. In such circumstances as these with such memory inefficient slow browsers, this polyfill (or any polyfill for that matter) would be impractical for large strings in such old browsers. Finally, note that you should run the below code through a minifier (especially closure compiler) to turn sequences like 0x1e << 3 into 0xf0. These sequences are not already precomputed because they serve to aesthetically illustrate how the polyfill works.
trans-unit.target: 下面的polyfill仅能满足W3要求的规格（不幸的是，不支持UTF-8以外的字符编码）。它旨在“开箱即用”在IE5中工作。但是，在IE5-IE9中，它将返回常规Array而不是TypedArray。在这种内存效率低下的慢速浏览器的情况下，对于这样的旧浏览器中的大字符串，此polyfill（或与此有关的任何polyfill）将是不切实际的。最后，请注意，您应该通过一个减法器（尤其是闭包编译器）运行以下代码，以将 0x1e << 3 类的序列转换为 0xf0 。这些序列尚未预先计算，因为它们可以从美学角度说明polyfill的工作原理。

trans-unit.source: The boombox sits inside a room (defined by the edges of the browser viewport), and in this demo, we can move and rotate it with the provided controls. When we move the boombox, the sound it produces changes accordingly, panning as it moves to the left or right of the room, or becoming quieter as it is moved away from the user or is rotated so the speakers are facing away from them, etc. This is done by setting the different properties of the PannerNode object instance in relation to that movement, to emulate spacialization.

trans-unit.source: The browser loads each listed script and executes it. Any global objects from each script may then be used by the worker. If the script can't be loaded, NETWORK_ERROR is thrown, and subsequent code will not be executed. Previously executed code (including code deferred using window.setTimeout()) will still be functional though. Function declarations after the importScripts() method are also kept, since these are always evaluated before the rest of the code.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器将加载并执行每个列出的脚本。然后，工作人员可以使用每个脚本中的任何全局对象。如果无法加载脚本，则会引发 NETWORK_ERROR ，并且后续代码将不会执行。但是，先前执行的代码（包括使用 window.setTimeout() 推迟的代码）仍然可以使用。还会保留 importScripts() 方法之后的函数声明，因为它们始终在其余代码之前进行求值。

trans-unit.source: The buffer size must be in units of sample frames, i.e., one of: 256, 512, 1024, 2048, 4096, 8192, or 16384. It controls the frequency of callbacks asking for a buffer refill. Smaller sizes allow for lower latency and higher for better overall quality.
trans-unit.target: 缓冲区大小必须以采样帧为单位,即:256、512、1024、2048、4096、8192或16384之一。256,512,1024,2048,4096,8192,或16384中的一个。它控制了要求重新填充缓冲区的回调频率。较小的尺寸可以降低延迟,较高的尺寸可以提高整体质量。

trans-unit.source: The callback method is passed a single argument, a DOMHighResTimeStamp, which indicates the current time when callbacks queued by requestAnimationFrame() begin to fire. Multiple callbacks in a single frame, therefore, each receive the same timestamp even though time has passed during the computation of every previous callback's workload. This timestamp is a decimal number, in milliseconds, but with a minimal precision of 1ms (1000 µs).
trans-unit.target: 回调方法仅传递一个参数 DOMHighResTimeStamp ，该参数指示由 requestAnimationFrame() 排队的回调开始触发的当前时间。因此，即使在计算每个先前回调的工作量的过程中经过了时间，单个帧中的多个回调也将获得相同的时间戳。该时间戳是一个十进制数（以毫秒为单位），但最小精度为1ms（1000 µs）。
